item.description:
Continuing our journey through the alphabet which began with Aoyama, this month we are setting our sights even farther south. Benjamin's Restaurant in Taunton was the clear winner in our "B" restaurant poll.

Opened as Benjamin's in 1968!, this early 1900's manor house long ago attained "institution" status. Judging by the comments of our members and what the Organizers have been able to learn from other sources, that status is well deserved. Atmosphere, service and most importantly, food, all rate high marks here, with dishes such as cranberry mango chicken, herb-crusted haddock and filet mignon served in several dining rooms on two floors; the rooms featuring fireplaces, book-lined shelves and the warm tones of real wood.

Please join us for an evening that promises to "B" a memorable one!

Price Range: Dinner entrees range from $12.95 (pasta primavera, harvest ravioli) to $32.95 (bone-in "Captain's cut" of prime rib), with a slight majority of entrees priced under $20.00.

Wheelchair Access: Yes

RSVP Deadline: Tuesday, March 18 @ 7:00 PM.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Benjamin's Restaurant
508-824-6313
698 Bay St., Taunton

Directions from points North (Boston, Braintree): Take Route 24 South to Route 495 North. Take Exit 9 (Bay St/Taunton) off Route 495, turning left onto Bay Street.

From points East (Plymouth): Take Route 44 West to Route 495 North. Take Exit 9 (Bay St/Taunton) off Route 495, turning left onto Bay Street.

From points South (Wareham, Cape Cod): Take Route 495 North to Exit 9 (Bay St/Taunton), turning left onto Bay St.
item.how_to_find_us: If you don't see any of your fellow members when you arrive, please just ask to be shown to our table. The names "Mike" and "South Shore Meetup Group" have been noted in our reservation.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: B is for Benjamin's!
